```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
samplelocations <- data.frame(
  name = c("Bamfield Marine Science Centre", "BMSC South Dock", "West Government Dock", "Island Health Dock"),
  lat = c(48.83535, 48.833394, 48.828944, 48.827150),
  lon = c(-125.13463, -125.136765, -125.139980, -125.137254),
  direction = c("right", "right", "left", "right")
)
```


```{r}
leaflet(data = samplelocations) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>%
  addMarkers(~lon, ~lat, label = ~name, labelOptions = ~labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, direction = direction, textOnly = TRUE, style = list("color" = "black", "font-weight" = "bold", "background" = "white", "padding" = "3px", "border-radius" = "5px")))
```
